name: Alice in the maze
description:
Submission for Matcha Spring Maze Jam. Theme: Growing, Mechanic: Maze

Content: You followed a rabbit into a wonderland and experienced some weird stuff. And now you are in a maze? What a day. Help Alice to find her way out of this maze.

Controls: WASD for movement, E for cookie

Idea: qualkappe
Programming and art: dunkelgrau
Music: Kevin MacLeod - Sneaky Snitch (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
